Zend_Gdata  
Gapps  
No 
No 

Description

Assists in constructing queries for Google Apps member entries.

Instances of this class can be provided in many places where a URL is required.

For information on submitting queries to a server, see the Google Apps service class, Zend_Gdata_Gapps.


Methods

__construct, getGroupId, getMemberId, getQueryUrl, getStartMemberId, setGroupId, setMemberId, setStartMemberId,

Description

Create a new instance.

Arguments

Name Type Description Default
$domain string | (optional) The Google Apps-hosted domain to use when constructing query URIs. null
$groupId string | (optional) Value for the groupId property. null
$memberId string | (optional) Value for the memberId property. null
$startMemberId string | (optional) Value for the startMemberId property. null

Return value

Type Description
n/a n/a

getGroupId( ) : string

Description

Get the group id to query for. If no group id is set, null will be returned.

Return value

Type Description
string The group id

getMemberId( ) : The

Description

Get the member id to query for. If no member id is set, null will be returned.

Return value

Type Description
The member id

getQueryUrl( ) : string

Description

Returns the query URL generated by this query instance.

Return value

Type Description
string The query URL for this instance.

getStartMemberId( ) : string

Description

Get the first username which should be displayed when retrieving a list of users.

Return value

Type Description
string The first username to be returned, or null if disabled.

Tags

Name Description
see setStartUsername

setGroupId( string   $value, ) : n/a

Description

Set the group id to query for.

Arguments

Name Type Description Default
$value string | The group id to filter search results by, or null to disable.

Return value

Type Description
n/a n/a

Tags

Name Description
see getGroupId

setMemberId( string   $value, ) : n/a

Description

Set the member id to query for. When set, only users with a member id matching this value will be returned in search results. Set to null to disable filtering by member id.

Arguments

Name Type Description Default
$value string | The member id to filter search results by, or null to disable.

Return value

Type Description
n/a n/a

Tags

Name Description
see getMemberId

setStartMemberId( string   $value, ) : n/a

Description

Set the first member id which should be displayed when retrieving a list of members.

Arguments

Name Type Description Default
$value string | The first member id to be returned, or null to disable.

Return value

Type Description
n/a n/a
